#summary endFormTag()
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing the closing `form` tag.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters:*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  #startFormTag(action="create")#
    <!--- your form controls --->
  #endFormTag()#
</cfoutput>
}}}
